official_title: To amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 to revise the method of calculating the amounts paid by public housing agencies in lieu of State, city, county, and local taxes, and for other purposes.
short_title: Public Housing Fair Compensation Act of 1993

summary.text: Public Housing Fair Compensation Act of 1993 - Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to revise the method of calculating the amounts paid by public housing agencies in lieu of State and local real and personal property taxes. Authorizes appropriations for such payments.

titles.title: Public Housing Fair Compensation Act of 1993
To amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 to revise the method of calculating the amounts paid by public housing agencies in lieu of State, city, county, and local taxes, and for other purposes.
